data.name: Template for authorization subject
data.fileText: UIN $uin Authentication $status

data.name: Template for authorization SMS
data.fileText: Your Authentication of UIN $uin using $authType on $date at $time Hrs $status at a device deployed by MOSIP Services.

data.name: Template for duplicate UIN Email
data.fileText:
Hi $!name_eng,

Your Request for Registration $!RID has failed because an UIN has been found against your details. Please visit your nearest Registration Office.
And Visit https://mosip.io/grievances

Thanks and Regards,
MOSIP Team

data.name: Template for duplicate UIN SMS
data.fileText:
Hi $!name_eng,

Your Request for Registration $!RID has failed because an UIN has been found against your details. Please visit your nearest Registration Office.
And Visit https://mosip.io/grievances

data.name: Template for Technical Issue Email
data.fileText:
Hi $!name_eng,

Your Request for Registration $!RID has failed because of an Technical issue please visit your nearest Registration Office.
And Visit https://mosip.io/grievances

Thanks and Regards,
MOSIP Team

data.name: Template for Technical Issue SMS
data.fileText:
Hi $!name_eng,

Your Request for Registration $!RID has failed because of an Technical issue please visit your nearest Registration Office.
And Visit https://mosip.io/grievances

data.name: Template for UIN generation Email
data.fileText:
Hi $!name_eng,

Your UIN for the Registration $!RID has been successfully generated and will reach soon at your Postal Address.

Thanks and Regards,
MOSIP Team

data.name: Template for UIN generation SMS
data.fileText:
Hi $!name_eng,

Your UIN for the Registration $!RID has been successfully generated and will reach soon at your Postal Address.

data.name: Template for update details Email
data.fileText:
Hi $!name_eng,

Your UIN details have been updated corresponding to the Registration Number $!RID and a Physical Copy of your UIN will reach you soon at your Postal Address.

Thanks and Regards,
MOSIP Team

data.name: Template for update Details SMS
data.fileText:
Hi $!name_eng,

Your UIN details have been updated corresponding to the Registration Number $!RID and a Physical Copy of your UIN will reach you soon at your Postal Address.

data.name: auth otp service
data.description: auth otp service for sending otp
data.fileText: Please find the otp $otp

data.name: Template for new registration Email Content
data.description: Template for new registration Email Content
data.fileText:
Dear $name, 
Thank you for registering with the digital identity platform. Your registration id is $RegistrationID. If there are any corrections to be made in your details, please contact the Registration centre within the next 4 days.

data.name: Template for new registration Email Subject
data.description: Template for new registration Email Subject
data.fileText: Registration confirmation

data.name: Template for new registration SMS
data.fileText:
Dear $name,
Thank you for registering with the digital identity platform. Your registration id is $RegistrationID. If there are any corrections to be made in your details, please contact the Registration centre within the next 4 days.

data.name: Template for OTP generation Email Content
data.description: Template for OTP generation Email Content
data.fileText:
Dear $name, 
OTP for username $username is $otp and is valid for $validTime minutes (Generated on $date at $time hrs).

data.name: Template for OTP generation Email Subject
data.description: Template for OTP generation Email Subject
data.fileText: One time password from digital identify platfor

data.name: Template for OTP SMS
data.fileText:
Dear $name, 
OTP for username $username is $otp and is valid for $validTime minutes (Generated on $date at $time hrs).

data.name: Template for update registration Email Content
data.description: Template for update registration Email Content
data.fileText:
Dear $name, 
Thank you for updating your details with the digital identity platform. Your registration id is $RegistrationID. If there are any corrections to be made in your details, please contact the Registration centre within the next 4 days.

data.name: Template for update registration Email Subject
data.description: Template for update registration Email Subject
data.fileText: Registration update confirmation

data.name: Template for update registration SMS
data.fileText:
Dear $name, 
Thank you for updating your details with the digital identity platform. Your registration id is $RegistrationID. If there are any corrections to be made in your details, please contact the Registration centre within the next 4 days.
